mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pets (user_id, pet_img, animal, pet_name, pet_birth, pet_gender, pet_breed, pet_weight) VALUES (#{userId}, #{petImg}, #{animal}, #{petName}, #{petBirth}, #{petGender}, #{petBreed}, #{petWeight})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pets WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT p.*, d.disease_name, a.allergy_name FROM pets p LEFT JOIN pet_disease pd ON p.id = pd.pet_id LEFT JOIN disease d ON pd.disease_id = d.id LEFT JOIN pet_allergy pa ON p.id = pa.pet_id LEFT JOIN allergy a ON pa.allergy_id = a.id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND p.id = #{petId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE pets set updated_at = NOW(),
pet_img = #{pet.petImg},
animal = #{pet.animal}, pet_name = #{pet.petName}, pet_birth = #{pet.petBirth}, pet_breed = #{pet.petBreed}, pet_gender = #{pet.petGender}, pet_weight = #{pet.petWeight}, isNeutered = #{pet.isNeutered} WHERE id = #{petId} AND user_id = #{pet.userId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
